name: 何震寰
objective: 本課程訓練運用數位科技能力，以進行建築領域中的複雜幾何設計形體的發展、描述、資訊擷取，並透過系統化流程加以合理化，以至建造完成。本課程授課方式為演講及實作並行，課程預期修課者發展出一套有創意的數位構築系統。
schedule:
Week 01 2/22:  Introduction
Week 02 2/29:  Tutorial 
Week 03 3/07:  Test
Week 04 3/14:  Tutorial 
Week 05 3/21:  Tutorial 
Week 06 3/28:  Lecture + Group discussion
Week 07 4/04:  清明連假
Week 08 4/11:  Group discussion + presentation 
Week 09 4/18:  期中考週
Week 10 4/25:  Mid-term presentation
Week 11 5/02:  Group discussion
Week 12 5/09:  Group discussion
Week 13 5/16:  成果設置 (5/18~21 新一代設計展)
Week 14 5/23:  advanced workshop
Week 15 5/30:  advanced workshop
Week 16 6/06:  advanced workshop
Week 17 6/13:  advanced workshop
Week 18 6/20:  期末考週
scorePolicy:
Exam 30%
Assignments, Final presentations+ exhibition 50% 
Class participation 20%
materials:
產品製造工法入門_產品+家具設計篇，羅伯.湯普森，龍溪圖書
Made Of...New Materials Sourcebook for Architecture and Design, Christiane Sauer, Gestalten, 2010
Techniques and Technologies in Morphogenetic Design, Guest-edited by Michael Hensel, Achim Menges and Michael Weinstock, AD, Wiley
Siteless_1001 Building Forms, Francois Blanciak, the MIT Press, 2008

name: 劉宛育
objective: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in digital technologies for extracting, developing, and analyzing data of complex geometries, while facilitating production of a systematic workflow for rationalization and constructability. The course will be conducted in the forms of lectures and tutorials, and expects students to develop unique and creative systems of digital fabrication.

Week 12 5/09:  Group discussion
Week 13 5/16:  成果設置 (5/18~21 新一代設計展)
